commit_scope: Keep --dangerously-skip-permissions for autonomous host-runner commands by demoting root execution to non-root and auto-provisioning a dedicated non-root user when none is available on the host runner.

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting branch push/PR checks plus production host-runner smoke after redeploy to verify auto-created non-root user path clears runner_non_root_user_unavailable.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: When a root host-runner receives a command containing --dangerously-skip-permissions and no eligible non-root user exists, the runner auto-creates a dedicated non-root account and executes the command under that account while keeping the flag.
test_flows: Create a claude task that includes --dangerously-skip-permissions and verify task context contains runner_exec_user with an auto-created non-root account instead of runner_non_root_user_unavailable.
Create a codex task and verify completion from railway-runner without runner_exec_user_unavailable.
Create a cursor task and verify claim path succeeds and failures, if any, are auth/token related rather than binary/root rejection.
